definition: band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Owing to the natural limit of the vocal cords, the roaring only betrays the gentility of the cat.
sentences.chinese: 也許是聲帶的天然性，怎麼聽都有貓的溫柔。

sentences.english: C5- Vocal cords, neck glands, pharynx.
Tone: Tones sre pitch variations, which are caused by the differing rates of vibration of the vocal cords.
sentences.chinese: 聲調是由於聲帶振動的速率的不同而引起的音高變化。

sentences.english: The soundtrack of the first Runaway has stayed chugging round the heads of many players.
sentences.chinese: 原聲帶首走失留歐一輪首腦許多球員。

sentences.english: To investigate the value of vocal fold abduction for bilateral vocal cord paralysis through the suspension laryngoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討支撐喉鏡下聲帶外展術對聲帶麻痹的療效。

sentences.english: To investigate the value of vocal fold abduction for bilateral vocal cord paralysis through the suspension laryngoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討支撐喉鏡下聲帶外展術對聲帶麻痹的療效。

sentences.english: The horse creates a vibrating sound with his mouth closed, from his vocal cords.
sentences.chinese: 馬閉上嘴從聲帶發出的振動的聲音。

sentences.english: Trained opera singer's bands can stretch nearly half an inch.
sentences.chinese: 受過訓練的歌劇演唱家的聲帶能伸展將近半英寸。

sentences.english: Qi-invigorating and Blood-activation Therapy in vocal nodules of children is effective and feasible.
sentences.chinese: 使用益氣活血法進行治療兒童聲帶小結有效而可行。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore the operating method of broad-based via fibre laryngoscope vocal polyp.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討纖維喉鏡下廣基聲帶息肉的手術方式。

sentences.english: One particular song won an Academy Award as it was the highlight of a remarkable soundtrack.
sentences.chinese: 其中一首能代表整個原聲帶的樂曲獲得了奧斯卡獎。

sentences.english: What's one of your favorite songs on the film's soundtrack?
sentences.chinese: 電影原聲帶裏你最喜歡哪首歌？

sentences.english: But the lion's mighty pipes are square.
sentences.chinese: 但獅子強有力的聲帶是方形的。

sentences.english: Below the vocal cords in this larynx are large ulcerations.
sentences.chinese: 喉聲帶下方可見大潰瘍。

sentences.english: This movie gets darker with every scene and so does the soundtrack.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影隨着故事的進行愈發黑暗，其原聲帶亦如此。

sentences.english: Most animals have triangular vocal cords.
sentences.chinese: 大多數動物是三角形聲帶。

definition: to eject/to exit from/to pop up
to affect/to produce a change in sth
to pull back/to shrink/to contract/(physiology) systole
